48  class SystemInfoValueServer : public virtual SystemInfoValueImpl, public virtual BaseValueServer
49  {
50  public:
51  SystemInfoValueServer(unsigned long parentId)
52  : BaseValueServer(parentId, BASE_VALUE_TYPE_SYSTEM_INFO)
53  , prvNumber()
54  , productionID()
55  , calibrationToolString()
56  , calibrationTimestamp()
57  , lensType()
58  , depthSensorType()
59  , illuminationType()
60  {
61  prvNumber.first = 0;
62  prvNumber.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
63  productionID.first = "";
64  productionID.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
65  calibrationToolString.first = "";
66  calibrationToolString.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
67  calibrationTimestamp.first = 0;
68  calibrationTimestamp.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
69  lensType.first = DepthSense::LENS_TYPE_INVALID;
70  lensType.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
71  depthSensorType.first = DepthSense::DEPTH_SENSOR_TYPE_INVALID;
72  depthSensorType.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
73  illuminationType.first = DepthSense::ILLUMINATION_TYPE_INVALID;
74  illuminationType.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION;
75  }
76 
77  SystemInfoValueServer(unsigned long parentId, const DepthSense::ROM::SystemInfo& value)
78  : BaseValueServer(parentId, BASE_VALUE_TYPE_SYSTEM_INFO)
79  , prvNumber()
80  , productionID()
81  , calibrationToolString()
82  , calibrationTimestamp()
83  , lensType()
84  , depthSensorType()
85  , illuminationType()
86  {
87  setSystemInfo( value );
88  }

90  virtual ~SystemInfoValueServer() {}

93  virtual void setPrvNumber ( DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context, uint32_t value) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); prvNumber.first = value; prvNumber.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_USER; }
94  virtual bool prvNumberIsReadOnly(DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context = NULL) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return false; }
95  virtual void setPrvNumber ( uint32_t value, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource objectSource ) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); prvNumber.first = value; prvNumber.second = objectSource; }
96  virtual bool getPrvNumberLoadedFromDevice(DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context = NULL) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return prvNumber.second == DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_DEVICE; }
97  DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource getPrvNumberSource() const { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return prvNumber.second; }

120  virtual DepthSense::LensType getLensType(DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context = NULL) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return lensType.first; }
121  virtual void setLensType ( DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context, DepthSense::LensType value)
122  {
123  if ( DepthSense::LENS_TYPE_INVALID == value )
124  {
125  throw DepthSense::PArgumentException::create("DepthSense::LensType","DepthSense::LENS_TYPE_INVALID is not a valid argument");
126  }
127 
128  DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() );
129  lensType.first = value;
130  lensType.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_USER;
131  }
132 
133  virtual bool lensTypeIsReadOnly(DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context = NULL) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return false; }
134  virtual void setLensType ( DepthSense::ROM::LensType value, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource objectSource ) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); lensType.first = enum_cast<DepthSense::LensType>(value); lensType.second = objectSource; }
135  virtual bool getLensTypeLoadedFromDevice(DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context = NULL) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return lensType.second == DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_DEVICE; }
136  DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource getLensTypeSource() const { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return lensType.second; }

139  virtual void setDepthSensorType ( DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context, DepthSense::DepthSensorType value)
140  {
141  if ( DepthSense::DEPTH_SENSOR_TYPE_INVALID == value )
142  {
143  throw DepthSense::PArgumentException::create("DepthSense::DepthSensorType","DepthSense::DEPTH_SENSOR_TYPE_INVALID is not a valid argument");
144  }
145 
146  DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() );
147  depthSensorType.first = value;
148  depthSensorType.second = DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_USER;
149  }

171  virtual bool getIlluminationTypeLoadedFromDevice(DepthSense::InterfaceImpl* context = NULL) { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return illuminationType.second == DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_DEVICE; }
172  DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource getIlluminationTypeSource() const { DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() ); return illuminationType.second; }
173 
174  void setSystemInfo( const DepthSense::ROM::SystemInfo& value )
175  {
176  prvNumber.first = value.getSystemInfoData().getPrvNumber();
177  prvNumber.second = value.getSystemInfoSource();
178  productionID.first = value.getSystemInfoData().getProductionId();
179  productionID.second = value.getSystemInfoSource();
180  calibrationToolString.first = value.getCalibrationToolString();
181  calibrationToolString.second = value.getCalibrationToolStringSource();
182  calibrationTimestamp.first = value.getCalibrationTimestamp();
183  calibrationTimestamp.second = value.getCalibrationTimestampSource();
184  lensType.first = enum_cast<DepthSense::LensType>(value.getLensType());
185  lensType.second = value.getLensTypeSource();
186  depthSensorType.first = enum_cast<DepthSense::DepthSensorType>(value.getSensorType());
187  depthSensorType.second = value.getSensorTypeSource();
188  illuminationType.first = enum_cast<DepthSense::IlluminationType>(value.getIlluminationType());
189  illuminationType.second = value.getIlluminationTypeSource();
190  }
191 
192  virtual DepthSense::ROM::SystemInfo getInternal() const
193  {
194  DepthSense::Utils::Threading::AutoLock lck( getMutex() );
195  DepthSense::ROM::SystemInfo ret;
196  ret.calibrationTimestamp( calibrationTimestamp.first );
197  ret.calibrationTimestampSource( calibrationTimestamp.second );
198 
199  ret.calibrationToolString( calibrationToolString.first );
200  ret.calibrationToolStringSource( calibrationToolString.second );
201 
202  DepthSense::ROM::SystemInfoData data;
203  data.setProductionId( productionID.first );
204  data.setPrvNumber( prvNumber.first );
205 
206  ret.systemInfoData( data );
207  ret.systemInfoSource( ( productionID.second == DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_USER || prvNumber.second == DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_USER ) ? DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_USER : DepthSense::ROM::OBJECT_SOURCE_IMPLEMENTATION );
208 
209  ret.lensType( enum_cast<DepthSense::ROM::LensType>(lensType.first) );
210  ret.lensTypeSource( lensType.second );
211 
212  ret.sensorType( enum_cast<DepthSense::ROM::SensorType>(depthSensorType.first) );
213  ret.sensorTypeSource( depthSensorType.second );
214 
215  ret.illuminationType( enum_cast<DepthSense::ROM::IlluminationType>(illuminationType.first) );
216  ret.illuminationTypeSource( illuminationType.second );
217 
218  return ret;
219  }
220 
221  private:
222 
223  std::pair< uint32_t, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > prvNumber;
224  std::pair< std::string, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > productionID;
225  std::pair< std::string, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > calibrationToolString;
226  std::pair< uint32_t, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > calibrationTimestamp;
227  std::pair< DepthSense::LensType, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > lensType;
228  std::pair< DepthSense::DepthSensorType, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > depthSensorType;
229  std::pair< DepthSense::IlluminationType, DepthSense::ROM::ObjectSource > illuminationType;
230  };
231 }
